game.name: Angry Rooster Run Subway
game.description:
Hey friends! You are playing the role of an angry rooster who has got participated in a racing competition. Are you ready to enter this new thrilling rooster run challenge? Join Angry Rooster Run Subway and be prepared to help the rooster escape traps and enemies on a difficult path! Now it is up to you to guide him to find his way to his beloved chicken. Do not get him disappointed. Be careful as the path is full of multiple challenges in this brand new adventure game!

Try to be extra careful when the rooster tries to get through all the traps and wild predators! He will be killed and exposed to death if comes in a contact with him. Make sure to attack all the enemies to survive till you achieve your mission in this HTML5 running challenge. Keep your eyes on the screen while running along with the craziest scenarios and have fun without download! Move left or right and drag to jump or slide to avoid the objects that make your character lose!

You would have multiple obstacles, barriers and subway trains to avoid in this addictive subway escape endless running game. This animal rooster wants to run away from his farmhouse to collect the eggs. Try to make him run as fast as you can and do not forget to operate him wisely when he flies in air while collecting the flying booster! His owner will keep chasing him so plan his every move to run for as long as you can in this animal surf run rooster game. Good luck to play other addictive and interesting runner games on atmegame.com!
